text: is the 19th single by Japanese idol girl group Nogizaka46. It was released on 11 October 2017. It reached number-one on the weekly Oricon Singles Chart with 851,000 copies sold. It was also number-one on the Billboard Japan Hot 100. == Release == This single was released in 5 versions. Type-A, Type-B, Type-C, Type-D and a regular edition. ==Track listing== All lyrics written by Yasushi Akimoto. === Type-A === === Type-B === === Type-C === === Type-D === === Regular Edition === == Participating members == === "Itsuka Dekiru kara Kyō Dekiru" === *Center: Asuka Saitō and Nanase Nishino ==Chart performance== ===Weekly=== ====Oricon==== {| class="wikitable" |- ! style="text- align:center;"|Chart ! style="text-align:center;"|Peak ! style="text- align:center;"|Debut Sales ! style="text-align:center;"|Sales Total |- |align="left"|Singles Chart | style="text-align:center;"| 1 | style="text- align:center;"| 851,000 |- |} ====Billboard Japan==== {| class="wikitable" |- ! style="text-align:center;"|Chart ! style="text-align:center;"|Peak |- |align="left"|Japan Hot 100 | style="text-align:center;"|1 |} ===Yearly=== ====Billboard Japan==== {| class="wikitable" |- ! style="text- align:center;"|Chart ! style="text-align:center;"|Peak |- |align="left"|Japan Hot 100 | style="text-align:center;"|16 |} ==References== Category:2017 singles Category:2017 songs Category:Japanese-language songs Category:Nogizaka46 songs Category:Oricon Weekly number-one singles Category:Billboard Japan Hot 100 number-one singles
